mapper.select: SELECT /* com.at.apcss.am.cmns.mapper.StdGrdMapper.selectStdGrd */ SG.APC_CD AS APC_CD , SG.ITEM_CD AS ITEM_CD , SG.GRD_SE_CD AS GRD_SE_CD , SG.GRD_KND AS GRD_KND , SG.GRD_KND_NM AS GRD_KND_NM , SG.ADTN_RT AS ADTN_RT , SG.DEL_YN AS DEL_YN , SG.SN AS SN FROM TB_APC_Std_GRD SG WHERE SG.APC_CD = #{apcCd} AND SG.ITEM_CD = #{itemCd} AND SG.GRD_SE_CD = #{grdSeCd} AND SG.GRD_KND = #{grdKnd} ORDER BY SG.APC_CD, SG.ITEM_CD, SG.SN
